abstract: While stocks have been trading in a broad range over the last three months, analysts said that the indexes might be carving out a new, deeper trench.
snippet: While stocks have been trading in a broad range over the last three months, analysts said that the indexes might be carving out a new, deeper trench.

headline.main: Dow Industrials Plunge to a 6-Year Low
headline.print_headline: Dow Industrials Plunge to a 6-Year Low
